thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 23 of 288
thread.title: Jincy

author: Jincy
title: Jincy
text:
I have recommended Hello Fresh to many of my friends and family. I do have a couple of reservations, specifically of the quality of particular foods.
We are not real pleased with the chicken. Typically I buy free range so perhaps we are spoiled with better tasting chicken. The beef has been fine and ditto with the pork chops except this week one chop had an excessive amount of fat. No big deal, I cut it off, however the amount of meat was compromised. These are not deal makers for me. I will continue to subscribe to HF. I love the ability to pause delivery when necessary or jsut to take a break.
